Deltatlog Task Management System User Manual

1. Getting Started
 To begin using Deltatlog, follow these steps:


1.1. Create a New Project
 - Click the floating button in the lower right corner of the screen.
 - Set your project parameters or do it later.
 - Deltatlog will try to retrieve a company logo based on the given name.
 - Click "OK" to save the project on all devices.


1.2. Create a New Task Associated with a Project
 - Click on the desired project.
 - Click the floating button in the lower right corner of the screen.
 - Set your task parameters.
 - Click "OK" to save the task.


2. Project Management
 Manage your projects effectively:


2.1. Edit Projects
 - Press and hold a project.
 - Select "Edit Project" to modify parameters.
 - Choose "Change Color" to organize tasks by color.
 - Select "Delete Project" to permanently remove a project and its data.


2.2. Edit Tasks
 - Press and hold the task you want to edit.
 - Choose "Edit Task" to modify parameters.


3. Task Execution
 Work on your tasks seamlessly:


3.1. Start Working on a Task
 - Open the project containing the task.
 - Locate the task within the project.
 - Click the play button to begin working.
 - Click the pause button to save work time.


4. Data Export
 Export your data easily:


4.1. Export All Data
 - Go to your projects and click the menu icon in the upper right corner.
 - Select "Export All Data."
 - Save the data as a .csv file.
 - Use your preferred email provider to send the file.


4.2. Export Data from a Single Project
 - Choose the project you want to export data from.
 - Access the project details.
 - Click the menu icon in the upper right corner.
 - Select "Export Project."
 - Save the project data as a .csv file.
 - Use your preferred email provider to send the file.


5. Account Settings
 Manage your account:


5.1. Change Your Password
 - Go to your projects and click the menu icon in the upper right corner.
 - Select "Change Password."
 - Enter your desired password and confirm it.
 - Click "OK" to change your password.


5.2. Delete Account
 - Go to your projects and click the menu icon in the upper right corner.
 - Select "Delete Account."
 - Confirm the deletion of your account and associated data.
 - Note: Account deletion is permanent and cannot be reversed.
